Name: Temple of Tides
Description: Primary structure, used to train Mur'gul Slaves, Mur'gul Reavers and receive gathered resources. Also contains the Naga weapon and armor upgrades, and the Submerge upgrade.

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current un-issued order and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current un-issued order and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Orders units that pop out of the building to immediately attack move to the targeted area. You can rally point gold mines or trees to auto-harvest. You can rally point a unit to have new units follow it when they finish building.
Root.Name: Set Rally Point

Root.Tooltip:
Basic worker unit. Can harvest gold and lumber, build structures, and Repair.

Attacks land units and trees.
Root.Name: Train Mur'gul Slave

Root.Tooltip:
Light melee amphibious unit.

Attacks land units.
Root.Name: Train Mur'gul Reaver

Root.Tooltip: Increases the attack damage of Naga attack units.
Root.Name: Upgrade to Coral Blades

Root.Tooltip: Further increases the attack damage of Naga attack units.
Root.Name: Upgrade to Chitinous Blades

Root.Tooltip: Further increases the attack damage of Naga attack units.
Root.Name: Upgrade to Razorspine Blades

Root.Tooltip: Increases the armor of Naga attack units.
Root.Name: Upgrade to Coral Scales

Root.Tooltip: Further increases the armor of Naga attack units.
Root.Name: Upgrade to Chitinous Scales

Root.Tooltip: Further increases the the armor of Naga attack units.
Root.Name: Upgrade to Razorspine Scales

Root.Tooltip: Gives Naga Myrmidons and Snap Dragons the ability to submerge under water, hiding them from view.
Root.Name: Research Submerge
